Util::EnergyEnsemble Class Reference

Detailed Description

A statistical ensemble for energy.

An energy ensemble has a type, which can be adiabatic or isothermal, and stores a temperature and inverse temperature beta if the type is isothermal.

void Util::EnergyEnsemble::readParam ( std::istream &  in) [virtual]

Read the type and (if necessary) temperature from file.

The type is specified in the input file by a string literal "adiabatic" or "isothermal".

Reimplemented from Util::ParamComposite.
